title: Fontlab: Kerning class error
content: When adding "æ", "ø" or "å" to any of my kerning classes, following error message occurs: "invalid token (text was "æ/ø/å")". Anybody seen this before?
author: Kenneth Knutsen

comments.content: Only basic ASCII characters are allowed. You have to type the names for such characters: "ae", "oslash", and "aring".
Or you can just drag and drop to save yourself lots of typing.
